page.title: 13Police Headquarters (1)
page.content: {North Yorkshire Police Headquarters} In Newby Wiske there are the North Yorkshire Police County Headquarters.They are housed in what once was a stately home.In 1948 the house was bought for a Police Training College and in 1977 it became the police headquarters.You can still see it was a beautiful home because it has big brass door knobs,large fire places and a lovely curving stair case. We met the Chief Constable and he answered our questions.We found out that there are 1163 policemen in the county and only 89 police women.In 1984 there were 6062 accidents and one of the worst was when a farmer was burning stubble and the fire got out of control and the smoke covered the road and cars crashed.
